Summary: Came onto tv screen as I watched golf.
trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Augusta
There were no other sightings in Augusta on or around April 10th 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsI was watching golf match and a player hit a high lofted ball and as the camera panned the sky watching the golfball something entered the screen at a high rate of speed and suddenly stopped as if watching. I think it was far away. It then left the screen I have it recorded.
